features: 【Flexible Adjustable Angle】Satisure video doorbell angle mount offers the function with adjustable angle ( 45°-135°）, you can easily to install it anywhere you need and get wider viewing. T shape design of doorbell mount also will not block video doorbell camera sensors and night vision.
【Anti-Theft Design】The video doorbell mount bracket designs with a full protective shell and anti-theft screw, make sure your ring/blink video doorbell away stolen and secures your property.

【Doorbell Compatibility】Anti-theft video doorbell door mount is compatible with most video doorbells, including Ring video doorbell (1/2/3/3Plus/4 generation, 2020-2021 Release, Pro-Pro2) and blink video doorbell 2021(Video Doorbell not included), compatible Max-size of Video doorbell is 5.11*2.55*1.18inches(13*6.5*3cm).

【Easy to Install】Fix the "adjustable base" of video doorbell mount by screws to the wall or any place you want, and combine the "back cover" to the "adjustable base" by screws, then put the ring/blink video doorbell into the "anti-theft protective shell" and secure around with sponge pads, finally connect it to the "back cover" and fix by screws on the bottom. completed and adjust the angle as you need to get better visible area.

【Warranty-Service】The package includes an anti-theft video doorbell mount holder, a user manual, screws and screwdrivers. we are online in 7*24h, if you have any product problems please contact us for prompt assistance or a replacement if needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It fit my current Ring Doorbell from 2020 and the angle was sufficient.
reviews.reviewText: Installing was a breeze because my son did it ;) It works as intended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The device was easy to install. Having an extra layer of protection (eyes) surrounding your living quarters does not hurt, especially at your 6 o'clock. The multi-angle device is a bonus allowing you to position the camera that best fits your point of view.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to install; easy to angle for perfect view, and holds my Ring an inch or two out from the wall which was perfect because I have a molding that would have partially blocked its view had I flush mounted it to the wall. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is that the case is not locked with an anti-theft screw.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EUFY 1080 WIRELESS CAMERA FITS PERFECT ⁷!QQ
reviews.reviewText: Tried other brands and my Eufy camera would not fit but this one worked perfectly. It also comes with foam to add to side and back so camera can be placed right in the middle and not move around which is a plus. The only thing is if someone wants to take it they can by prying it off the piece where it adjusts the angle because its made of plastic and are small plastic lips that hold it . The way to avoid this is to put a screw right thru the inside once you angle the device as there is a hole inside so I installed a 2 1/2 screw thru the device inside wjere the camera sits to the wall so it can be harder to pry off the wall just in case someone gets the idea to try and steal it as I live in a apartment on the main avenue. Because I seen reviews for other devices that were antitheft but got stolen anyways. This device worked for my Eufy camera no doubt will post pics once installed and update .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Misses a lot of activities
reviews.reviewText: As a doorbell this thing is fine, but the camera misses a lot of package deliveries after tweaking the settings several times. Not super dependable in my experience, sometimes it works, sometimes not. But overall I like it, when someone actually rings the doorbell the video turns on quickly and I can see them on my echo show, problem is not a lot of people ring doorbells these days so there's that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great and easy to install. I have a gen 2 and realy didn't need the extra pads they gave me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mount for Ring Door Cam
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this to safety our Ring Cam as well as mount it in a better way to the exterior. It worked perfectly and allowed us a better view with our Ring which was being impacted by the brick. Highly recommended.

I so love that things I purchase do exactly what they are advertised to do. All the parts arrived and even extras, it was easy to assemble and install. One disadvantage that is a bit of a pity for me: it is not possible to pin the desired angle of the device with a small screw after you achieved it.
